summary: The customer service agent provided the customer with information on the three upgrade packages offered by Contoso Wireless: Basic (up to 100Mbps download speeds and unlimited data for $39.99/month), Standard (up to 200Mbps download speeds and unlimited data for $59.99/month), and Premium (up to 300Mbps download speeds and unlimited data for $79.99/month). All packages come with 24/7 customer support, parental controls, access to Wi-Fi hotspots, and discounts on select devices. The customer was then instructed on how to sign up for a package by visiting the Contoso Wireless website and filling out the form with their contact information.
